titleStmt.title: The murtherer justly condemned, or, An account of George Feast, a butcher of Shoreditch, being found guilty ... for the barbarous bloody murther of his wife ... also some account of his penitent behaviour in Newgate. To the tune of, Packingtons pound.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Imperfect: faded with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
